mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount, SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, entry_time, exit_time)) AS totalMinutes, -- ✅ 수정 SUM(IFNULL(p.total_fee, 0)) AS totalPaid, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, entry_time, exit_time)) AS averageMinutes -- ✅ 수정 FROM parking_log pl LEFT JOIN payment p ON pl.payment_id = p.payment_id WHERE pl.member_id = #{memberId} AND pl.exit_time IS NOT NULL
